establishConnection

public void establishConnection(BluetoothSocket socket,
                                BluetoothDevice device)
Establish connection. The method is called in case when application received request from client or successfully connected to other device. The method simply opens Bluetooth channel to operate, what means data exchanging.

Parameters:
socket - the socket
device - the device
